title: you nerfed annie!
body: I know this is late since it was many updates ago, but you nerfed the aoe of annie's tibbers. It used to be that u just need to hit someone with it on the very edge and it would be a stun but now u need almost a direct hit and hitting them on the edge dont count as a hit anymore.

replies.body:
Good?

Call me old-fasioned, but I like the days of; if you want to stun someone, you have to actually **hit them** with the spell.
Bad. Very bad. I'm an annie main(ranked 5th in oce for mastery points in annie) and this nerf is bad

Why?

She has the single greatest last hitting tool in the game.
If you miss a minion once in lane, you're doing something terribly wrong. So she permanently has the gold advantage, and most definitely has the scalings to capitalise on that. 

Her kit is very simple, literally the only thing she has to actually put effort into to aim, is her ult, so why should she be rewarded for near misses?

If you truly are ranked 5th on Annie, you should have no problem at all hitting an instant ranged AoE spell. I don't see the issue?

I mean, don't get me wrong, she's a good champ, and i like her, but she isn't exactly rocket science. You put your cursor on the enemy and press R, and unless you just couldn't help it and veered off to the side, they should be stunned, it's not like it has a cast time.

Try landing all Xerath or Karthus's crap.

> Try landing all Xerath or Karthus's crap.


I can land Karthus's ult every time
I have a hard time landing Karthus ult in Urf
Doesn't matter, I play Aurelion Sol, hit Annie with my W 20+ times, no kill. She will never be as weak as Sol.
